short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix scroll problems in Canva presentation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides the scrollbars in a Canva Scrolling Web Presentation, and allows you to scroll each slide by using Page Down and Page Up. The up and down arrows scroll by one pixel to correct any offset if needed.
